strapiPost.title: Nonprofits Join Hands To Form The Children And Family Advocacy Center
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by Children and Family Advocacy Center
strapiPost.content:
Childrenâ€™s Advocacy Center of Benton County and Restoration Village have combined to form the Children and Family Advocacy Center, unifying around one mission with one voice to more effectively restore lives impacted by trauma, break the cycle of abuse, and build resilient families.

  • On a mission: The dedicated trauma-informed professionals at the CFAC work diligently to empower those impacted by trauma by providing comprehensive services like advocacy, forensic interviewing, medical exams, and counseling.
  • Safe place: The Center also hosts training and education opportunities intended to break the cycle of abuse and offers residential housing for women and their children, providing food, housing, and transportation.

Follow their new socials @cfacbentonco and visit their new website HERE.
